name: Overall direction
text: The State shall strive to improve the quality of life for Hawaii's present and future population through the pursuit of desirable courses of action in six major areas of statewide concern which merit priority attention:  economic development, population growth and land resource management, affordable housing, crime and criminal justice, quality education, and principles of sustainability. [L 1978, c 100, pt of §2; am L 1986, c 276, §29; am L 2011, c 181, §4]
